runs.comm: tossed up on the stumps and he mistimes the shot back down the track
flights up a full toss outside leg stump, again he mistimes the shot
gets off the mark now, driving the ball toward mid-off
flighted outside leg stump, tucks him up, Warner plays to the on side
comes out and Botha fires it in flat, getting Warner defending
and again! Fired in flat and Warner, on the move, drives it back to Botha
fullish outside off stump, inviting the drive, but no shot offered
slides down the pads, deflected off the thigh, Boucher dives and fumbles
ouch! Steyn keeps it full on leg stump, Warner looks to swing it away but cops it flush in the midriff, takes a few puffs to collect himself, another bot ball though
pitches on leg stump, Warner shuffles and knocks the ball to midwicket
bang, thats a beauty! Marsh swings the shorter ball of one leg and strikes it off the middle of the bat for a flat six over deep square leg
pushes a length ball straight to backward point to end the over
starts off a bit short and Warner clubs it wide of mid-on, not timed too well
another swing from Warner, but again not off the middle at all
overpitched and driven to Morne at mid-off, who slides to save runs
full on the stumps, Warner makes room and smacks that very hard back to Parnell, who deflects it of the boots to cover, that must have stung the bowler
full on off stump, Warner heaves it through midwicket for two
full and wide outside off stump and Warner steers it to backward point
pitches on a length and Marsh drives it straight to mid-on
very tidy stuff, straight on middle and leg, pushed to the man at point
swing and a miss, Morne pitches it up and Marsh gives it a go
lands on a good length, dabbed with soft hands to cover and he sprints
high full toss outside off stump, Warner slaps it down the ground, Botha dives and cuts it off from mid-off, very well stopped, that was headed to the ropes
top shot, just flicked away through midwicket, very easy on the eye
the sound of timber! You miss, I hit! Steyn pitches full and straight, Warner swings and misses, and the ball takes out middle stump
back of a length and Ponting pushes the ball to the man at point
139.6ks, pitched up wide, Ponting goes for a pull and misses
that will be wide, too full and swinging and Ponting chases it again
slower ball, 116ks, but sliding down the pads for another wide
full down leg stump and flicked away to midwicket for one
pitches full just outside leg stump, swinging through the air, Marsh misses the flick and scampers a leg bye as the ball rolls wide of Boucher
again Steyn drifts down the pads and bowls another wide
thats the length, pitches on the stumps and Ponting defends it back
pulls a length ball down toward mid-on and runs hard for the single
pushes Ponting onto the back foot, dabbed toward point
beaten on the drive, full outside off stump and he swings at it
comes forward, then goes back, and forces the ball to point
pitches full and Ponting pushes the drive down to mid-off
pitches back of a length, Marsh pulls a cramped shot to midwicket
soft dismissal this time, Marsh doesn't move his feet much as he attempts to clear the infield, and just scoops the ball up in the air to Botha at mid-on
bowls it full to bring Ponting forward and he steers it to backward point
throws the kitchen sink at one pitched up outside off stump, carving a thick outside edge over gully that drops safely wide of the the fielder at third man
overpitched and Ponting drives handsomely to the man at mid-off
this one pitches just short of a length and Ponting pulls across the line, more off the front foot initially, there's a noise as the ball brushes his arm through to Boucher
sumptuously flicked down to fine leg, where Amla dives in vain
tossed up on the stumps, Hussey drives into the covers
tossed up, Ponting flicks well, but a super dive from Gibbs at midwicket
flicks this one finer and gets a single this time
slowly tossed up, Hussey shuffles and dabs the ball to midwicket
drifts down from a shorter length, Ponting plays a little paddle shot
well bowled, full and flat, driven to the off, where Gibbs cuts it off
pitches on the stumps, Ponting shuffles and clips it to midwicket
searches for the yorker, bowls it too full, Ponting drives to midwicket
lovely shot! Ponting! Down he comes, just flicking the slower ball over midwicket for six, thats well held too by a fan in a South African tee shirt

shot, and what fielding! Ponting drills a full ball ramrod straight back past the stumps, Duminy dives across from long-on, stops it superbly, and flicks a throw to Morne at long-off, who collects very well ... talk about a tag team
comes out and slogs a premeditated shot down to long-on for one
slower ball, pitches on leg stump and Hussey plays it back
tossed up, Ponting comes out and flicks to midwicket

missed stumping! The bounce undoes Hussey and Boucher, Botha lured the batsman out of his crease, turned the ball across him, but it spit up and surprised the wicketkeeper, tough chance but it should have been stumped
awesome shot, Hussey uses his feet and collects on the full, driving through the covers, the sweeper dives with the ball and both go tumbling over the ropes
tossed up on leg stump, pushed toward midwicket
comes out and takes it on the full, flicking to the man at midwicket
fired in outside off stump, steered out to van Jaarsveld at deep cover
not a half-volley at all but Hussey plays a super cover drive on the up
another quality hit from Hussey, just a short-arm bunt over midwicket
make it three in row, Parnell drifts straight and gets bunted over mid-on
comes out and middles the ball, placing it between cover and point
pitches on a length and he reaches out to force it into the covers
pitches on a length outside off and he drives it to extra cover
slower ball commits Ponting on the front foot, he then opens the face and dabs the ball past Boucher to a tumbling short third man, smartly getting Hussey on strike
good shot for one, Hussey dances down and short-arm-jabs the ball flat over midwicket, one bounce and to the sweeper placed out there for this shot
full and drifting down leg stump, easily flicked out to deep midwicket
pulls a length ball off one knee, swatting it out to deep midwicket
full toss surprises Ponting, who loses a hand off the bat but chops it right into the gap a gully and beats third man, Boucher whips the bail as he pulls out
on middle and leg and he works it away for another easy couple
starts off with a short ball which Hussey pulls wide of midwicket
comes out and rides the bounce of another short ball, playing a most excellent front-foot cut between cover and point, and Gibbs cannot stop that one
drops in a slow bouncer, Ponting takes his eyes off it as he pulls, and survives with a single toward square leg, betting Hussey back on strike

freat reflexes from the bowler! Hussey inside-edges the ball toward the on side, Morne sprints forward and collects, then flicks a direct hit onto the base of the stumps to get Ponting short by some distance
full outside off stump and he gets off the mark with a drive past cover

oh well held, Duminy! Thats one for the ages! You aren't going to see much better in the outfield than that gem of a catch! Hussey takes a hand off the bat as he chips the ball over mid-off, the ball beats Duminy by some distance but he doesn't for a second take his eyes off it, running ages down toward long-off, covering great distance, then times his dive perfectly to take it
flat outside off stump, he goes back to work it wide of midwicket
throws the bat at  a wide one and flashes an edge to gully
tossed up wide and White hammers it through extra cover
well bowled, Duminy keeps it full and White drives down to mid-on
makes room and comes out to chip the ball over cover for two
drifts down the pads, deflected down to square leg, who fumbles
hello, thats gone! Another brilliant strike from Hussey, clearing the front leg and teeing off for a dinger rows back over long-on, yowza
expectedly, the ball is shorter and Hussey pulls out to van Jaarsveld
fired in on leg stump, White mistimes the flick, Albie steams in, there is some hesitation, but Hussey wants the single, bowler collects and misses the stumps
slower ball, Hussey picks it and uses the length to swat past square leg
full toss, bunted down the ground, with one hand off the handle
pitches on the stumps, starts to swing down, White clears the leg and scoops a thick outside edge over backward point and two fielders run after the ball
backs away well outside leg stump to whip a full toss to midwicket
superb stuff from Botha, who first fires it in full on the stumps and then intercepts the drive, throwing it back on the bounce to Boucher

flights a yorker on leg stump, Hussey flicks it out to the deep, a flat throw comes back on the line to Boucher, who collects it superbly from Steyn and breaks the sticks a fraction after the batsman lunges back over the line, what a take though
low-dipping full toss outside leg stump, Hussey flicks and gets a thick inside edge to the off side, White calls him through for the single
fired in full again and White makes room to flick away a single
reverse-paddles a low full toss off the stumps, gully dives and saves runs
swinging low full toss, which Hussey swings out to Gibbs at cow corner

ah, Duminy misjudges this one, should have been taken! White clears the front leg and slams the ball over the in field, not timed well, Duminy charges in from long-off but realizes he has over-run it then, leaps back but cannot hold on
what a shot! Stand and deliver, drilling the ball so hard back past the stumps
another firm strike to a full one, absolutely smashed over cover
sorry, four in row! Parnell serves up a full toss and White bunts over mid-on
slower ball, Parnell holds back the length, White swings out to the deep
attempted yorker on leg stump, well clipped through mid-on for a couple
now he serves up full and wide, no shot offered and he looks to the umpire
pitched full and wide again, this time Hussey steers a single to cover
full on the pads, flicked casually out to deep square leg

dropped by Parnell at wide long-off! Hussey comes out and looks to go over the top, but he's not to the pitch and bobs the ball over mid-off, its up in the air for a long time, Parnell watches the ball as he sprints across and dives excellently forward, but cannot hold on, so Hussey gets a superb half-century
full and wide from Steyn, Hussey reaches out and dabs two past cover
backs away, Morne slips in a short one, 120ks, and White pulls out
attempted yorker on the stumps, White walks away and drives it back hard, and Morne fields it well on the follow through
short and wide, cut out to the deep, where a fumble allows the second
slower ball, White clears the length and slaps the length delivery, very flat and hard, just wide of a diving mid-off and Duminy cannot cut if off in the deep
all over, with a six! Take a bow, Cameron White! Morne sends up a high full toss and White doesn't disappoint, clubbing it over the field and it lands just over the ropes at wide long-off
